result.title: MetLife Preferreds Reviewed: Hold For Now
result.text: MetLife, Inc. offers three exchange-traded preferred stocks, providing investors with diversification beyond bank issuers. MET's strong financials, including a AA- S&P rating and net income 18x preferred dividends, support the safety of its preferred stock payouts. Among MET's preferreds, Series A offers the best current yield and floating rate protection in a rising rate environment, though all are callable.

result.title: MetLife: Decreasing Interest Rates Make Fixed Rate Preferred Stock Very Attractive
result.text: MetLife remains financially robust, with preferred dividends well covered by net income and ongoing share repurchases supporting shareholder value. MET.PR.E fixed-rate preferred shares offer a 5.7% stripped yield, trade below par, and present an attractive spread over 5-year Treasuries. Call risk for MET.PR.E rises as rates fall, but the yield and price below $25 make it appealing; Series F offers lower call risk for cautious investors.
